    • Method Detail

      • getProp

        public static java.lang.String getProp(java.lang.String key)
                                throws C3PROException
        Get the value of the property described in conf.properties file
        Parameters:
        key - The key of the property
        Returns:
        The value of the property.
        Throws:
        C3PROException - If the property key does not exist.

      • getAuthCredentials

        public static java.lang.String getAuthCredentials(java.lang.String key)
                                           throws java.io.IOException,
                                                  C3PROException
        Returns the content of the the credential file whsoe path is encoded in the value of the key parameter
        Parameters:
        key - The key of the property in config.properties that contains the path of the file
        Returns:
        The content of the file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there is a problem reading the file
        C3PROException - In case the parameter is not well-formed
